column3: â€œOne of my favorite smelling and tasting buds. Very fruity smell like peaches and apples, accompanied by flowers like fresh blossoms with undertones of skunk. column3: â€œDefinitely enjoyed this strain, smells like a hint of Apple , lime green brownish hairs, good amount of crystals , decent taste and very Fluffy. Medium high. 1-10 probably a 8. column3: â€œThe best relaxing high I've ever had, probably after today trying it the first time it has become my favorite strain. Relieves ALL PAIN and completely makes muscle tension disappear. Definitely recommend, nice for being out in public, and great for physical conditions.â€
